content.detailedDescription: My auntie was driving when i looked out my window a bunch of white lights in the sky appear. we thought it was a airplane or helicopter. but then the lightes disappeared and one beamed back in the sky so we pulled over and took pictures. but then a hovering thing started changing colours. i felt scared and curious but my auntie started driving and i lost sight of the ufo
content.summary: We.Were driving then 8 lights appeared and there was a flying thing under it changing colours

content.detailedDescription: While my boyfriend and i were driving home from my parents' house, i was looking out of the passenger window when i saw a bright green light orb falling rapidly from the sky at a speed at least 5x faster than a plane leaving a trail in the sky before it suddenly disappeared before it had even reached the tree line.
content.summary: Bright green orb rapidly fell and suddenly disappeared before it even reached the tree line while i was heading home from my parents' house.

content.detailedDescription: Secured material multiple locations and people
content.summary: Observed faltering/waited/recovered

content.detailedDescription:
At 05:19 pm, 12/01/17 i was at home and received a text from a relative asking me to watch a snap they just sent which i did. two videos were then sent to me by text.
i went outside with binoculars to look eastward in the direction they were seen. their house is about two miles east of mine. i also saw an object that i couldn’t identify as an aircraft. 
my first thoughts were that the object(s) were ultralights and that the glowing appearance was from the sun that was low in the west.
the object flew to the north and out of view then south and out of view. finely i saw an object much higher going north which went out of sight.
after studying the videos i could not conclude that they were a known type of aircraft or even that they were of the same object. the sound on the videos is from the homeowners grass trimmer.
content.summary: A family member sent a text and two videos of object(s) presumed to be drones.

content.detailedDescription:
I add a compilation of the photos, i work with aviation and it is not an airplane or helicopter.

objects connect in the sky and after move to horizon.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like objects. moving, connecting
content.locationName: Krong Siem Reap, Siem Reap Province

content.detailedDescription:
While driving i-95 south through georgia, my wife and i observed a triangular shaped craft traveling nw with no lights. there was an airplane traveling a short distance behind it.

we have no idea what it was, but it was definitely big, flying low and had absolutely no lights on.
content.summary: Saw triangle shaped craft, sun down evening time, traveling at less than 1,000 ft with no lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work one night and i happened to look upwards from the road, towards the sky for some odd reason. upon looking up at the sky i saw a small orb of light. it zipped across the sky a short distance and while i was staring at it it just disappeared or clicked off. it was there one moment and gone the next. it wasn't bright enough to throw off shadows or light an area, it moved too fast for it to be anything i could think of. it did not appear to come from anywhere it was just there, and in a matter of 5-10 seconds zipped straight across and was gone. i couldn't see it anywhere else in the sky. it appeared to be within roughly 25-75 ish feet id guess away. i instantly tried to find it and think about what it was i saw but have come up with no explanation.
content.summary: A light flew across the sky and disapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back from a doctors appointment, and was heading west on university drive, when i seen a test tube shaped craft hovering less than a hundred feet up from the ground surface, and over albertsons grocery store on the corner of val vista drive, and university drive in mesa, arizona. i was sitting on the passenger side of my car while my roommate drove. i glanced over and knew that what i was seeing was a craft of  extraterrestrial origin. the craft was a dull metalic nickel plated color, and was a very large cigar shaped or test tube shaped. the craft stayed stationary and not moving for several minutes as i observed the most amazing thing i have ever seen. we turned south onto val vista drive and as we drove to our home i continued to watch the craft until i could no longer see the craft anymore. the traffic was moderately moving along, and i know other people seen it besides myself.
content.summary: Test tube shaped dull metallic stationary hovering craft over albertsons grocery store

content.detailedDescription: was on cell phone w daughter went outside onto front porch around 8 pm immediately notice glowing object at low altitude approaching from the east moving t slow speed.It was coming away from airport.I quickly told daughter i'd have to call her back and took short video on phone.It wastaveling on straight line over the house so i snapped two photos before it disappeared heading west.
content.summary: Stepped onto front porch noticed strange object

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard with 3 friends around 11pm in tempe, az facing south when my fiancee and i spotted a bright gold light moving west at 45 degrees. we pointed our friends in the westerly direction and said, "it's the iss!" our friends hand never seen it before. though i recall the iss being more white-light in color, not gold. i believe the object had the same speed of a satellite/iss.  we looked for what was a total of 8 to 10 seconds when the gold light went dark abruptly then reappeared as a dull blue white light like an aircraft beacon, which blinked continuously light to dark in half-second intervals. i saw the light blink on and off continuously until it was lost in the horizon. this object was so far away there was no sound to be heard. 

i was very surprised, excited and astonished by this having never seen this phenomenon occur before. i have watched numerous videos of the space shuttle re-entry and this was very nearly the same experience--a glowing sphere that becomes a consistent white light glowing from the heat of re-entry. only this object blinked and no shape of the object itself could be seen.

though i have no evidence of this (due to it's great distance from us), i strongly believe it was descending and headed in the direction of edwards air force base. looking at a map, i would estimate it's trajectory would lead it to the mohave desert/edwards.
content.summary: Gold large iss-like light moves westerly and suddenly goes dark and blinks dull beacon light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from an event on a long, strait back-country road that i now drive frequently at about 55 mph. i hit a portion of open road with harvested fields on either side, and a pair of white (not warm white, orange, or blueish - pure white) headlights came into view ahead, resembling 7" rounds. 

they were low to the road, similar in height to a late 90's honda accord, and spaced in a manner consistent with a car. i saw no running lights as one would expect near headlights. they appeared to be approaching at a speed consistent with a car. i hit a slight dip in the road that obscured the position of the headlights for a half second or less, and upon that section coming back into view the headlights were gone. i immediately felt that something was wrong - a car shouldn't have disappeared in a half second. my measurements indicated that the distance between myself and the lights was .2 of a mile, or roughly 105ft.

if a vehicle was there that had turned, i would have seen the side running lights and taillights. the headlights had disappeared across the open stretch, just inside where houses were placed. upon reaching the point where i saw the headlights, there was nothing there that could explain it. no house lights, no taillights, no running lights, open garage doors, or any movement of any kind. i distinctly remember a road extending from the right side - i saw a sign and everything. i looked down that long, straight road and saw nothing. i checked every house as i passed and saw nothing.

i was just beginning to tell myself that it was nothing when the lights reappeared behind me in the spot that they disappeared to begin with, roughly equidistantly. it wasn't like a car had turned onto the road, it was like a car had been sitting there and then turned them on. it was immediate. they were much brighter than before, and i immediately felt a visceral terror. i felt that i had to get away from them. i panicked and floored it, hitting 60 mph before turning off at 30 mph. in my car, i can turn off all lights (no daytime running lights, either) and did so while fleeing, hoping that they couldn't see me turn off the road. the headlights were so bright that they illuminated the inside of my car and a 50ft tree ahead from top to bottom. they also seemed to be tailing me from the time they reappeared, maintaining the same distance behind me. when i looked in the direction of the lights after turning off the road, i could clearly make out two shafts of light, coming from the road which at this point was obscured by low-lying crops. i watched my rearview as i sped away but didn't see the lights follow behind me.

i stayed up for an hour or so more and tried to forget about it. after a few months, having told the story once, i decided that i wanted to investigate it myself. i went back to the stretch of road in daylight with an analytical mindset, and it only confused me more. i tried to pin down the exact stretch, which i knew ended at the road i turned off on, and that the headlights vanished and reappeared in the same spot in the housing area. but the road that went off on the right was a problem. the closest road was too far away, and the distance wasn't right.

that stumped me for a while before telling a member of mufon my story when he brought the subject of the paranormal up, and i went out with renewed interest in what happened. i drove up and down the section of road a number of times and located the dip in the road, and i am certain that this dip is the one i remember. it is the right distance from the houses, and there are open fields on either side. there is no road that goes from the right side between that point and where i turned off.

everything else matches - the houses, the distance, the position of the lights, but it is clear to me that this road i remember isn't actually there. there are no signs that i could confuse for a road sign, and no long stretch of anything that could be mistaken for a road. the road in my memory is a repeat of a road much farther behind the dip, almost as though that was copy-pasted in my memory. trying to fit that road in is what confused me for so long, but now i am confident in the location.

add to that that there is no place to turn off right there save two driveways that i checked, and in any case there was no way to obscure a vehicle in half a second there. there is a ditch on both sides of the road that inhibit making such a maneuver. i looked at both locations as i drove by them that night and saw nothing. there is no place to turn a car off and hide it - none of the trees are laying that low to the ground, and no large bushes either. it's easy to brush this off as someone panicking at a car they encountered late at night, and for a while i thought that myself, but upon critically examining the location and my memory i am confident that a car has been crossed out as a possibility. 

i cannot explain what happened, and even when it was suggested that i should make a report i hesitated. at no time did i get the idea or feeling that this was of extra-terrestrial origin. i thought that maybe it was a 'ghost car', but the distinct memory of a road that doesn't actually exist at that location (and yes, i'm sure i was on the same road at the same spot - there are none others like it in the area) leads me to believe that my memory was tampered with. i have talked with a mufon member and have been told that similar events have been reported, so i figured that if anything this report adds another data point to your documentation.

as a final note, this event has had a lasting psychological impact. ever since the event, if i am driving late at night and headlights appear behind me i slowly begin to panic. it builds the longer the headlights remain behind me, especially if they mirror turns i make in an attempt to loose them. i never had this reaction before the event described above.

in the attached map, the three white dots are where things took place. the dot on the far right is the dip, where i saw the lights vanish. the middle dot is roughly where the lights were, and where i remembered a road. the dot on the left is where i was when they reappeared. i turned off on the road extending to the bottom of the picture on the left side of the image.
content.summary: Lights similar to headlights ahead on road disappeared in a half second with no explanation, reappearing behind me equidistantly, brighter than before. lit tall tree and car interior clearly. very clear memory of road feature that does not exist.

content.detailedDescription: Me encontraba con mis dos hijos en el parque jugando fútbol en compañía de otros vecinos, luego compramos helados y nos recostamos en el suelo cuando de repente mi hijo mayor (5 años) y yo vimos una esfera de luz muy alta en el cielo, no le quité la mirada ni un momento entonces le dije a mis dos vecinos que había algo en el cielo, ellos demoraron un poco en ubicar con precisión la esfera de luz hasta que lo lograron. la esfera viajaba en dirección derecha a nuestra mirada hasta que desapareció enttre las nubes.
content.summary: 4 personas observamos una esfera de luz en el cielo durante varios minutos hasta que desapareció en las nubes

content.detailedDescription: Traveling on 55 east i got off the barnes ave exit. as i am exiting i see a black object with a bright orange light traveling east getting ready to cross the barnes ave bridge. once i am on the bridge i stop to take pictures and video of the object. it crosses highway 52 still traveling east then passing about 20 feet from a water tower on the other side of the highway. then traveling on 494 east crossing the wakota bridge i see to my right the object flying over buildings now traveling more northeast crossing the mississippi river. as i continued to travel on 694 north i lose track of the object and see a helicopter that is now running parallel to me as i travel 694 for about a mile and then i don't see it anymore
content.summary: When exiting highway 55

content.detailedDescription:
Every morning i pray outside at 6am.This morning saw a large red and a smaller white light traveling up from the south. lookedwhat's everyegular large cabin crouser making a turn around the point. about a mile away. before i knew it the object had traveled over a mile on the water
no sound, no wake in about 20 sec.I live to photo boats, sunrises any big storm etc. have lived here 1 and a half yrs. i know what's on this waterway.
content.summary: Passed in front of me on the icw traveling at 100 mph, no sound, no wake.

content.detailedDescription: Black triangle with 3 orange lights on its under belly seen flying nw. could not make out the size or the elevation of the object but it flew fairly fast and turned slightly. it was a quiet night and this object was completely silent. it was weird.
content.summary: Black triangle with three dim orange lights seen flying nw fairly fast. completely silent.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard at 2am sitting on the step of the back door which faces west. smoke break. i heard a very faint hum. less than 1 second later i looked north and saw a black triangle, altitude about 500 feet. white circular light in each corner. the dark black triangle was more prominent against the dark gray sky because there was slight cloud cover and the valley is populated and well lit. it flew from north to south. there is some military aircraft seen around here. this was definitely a military aircraft. i would normally have thought... "cool... they've got themselves a new toy they're checking out at the local test base i think is somewhere southwest of here." the only reason this was different was because the speed + size + sound did not compute with my remedial high school level of understanding physics. it flew across the valley in less than 2 seconds. size was probably 40-50 feet corner to corner, 400-500 feet above me, approx 400 mph.  i should have heard or felt something more being so close. the hum was so faint, i doubt most people could hear it. "stealth" was my immediate thought. after thinking about it for over a month, i'm also a little ticked off i had to see something like this. i could have lived my whole life happily without this enigma. but i'm sure, one day in the distant future, the declassified info will be common knowledge and i'll be reminded of this 2 seconds of my life.
content.summary: Black triangle, 30-40 feet corner to corner,  circular light each corner, almost silent. alt 500 feet. 400-600mph. southern heading.  2am. flew across the valley floor of utah county.  sept/oct 2017.

content.detailedDescription: I was changing for a christmas work party, december 1, 2017 approximately 5:45 pm, in mississauga on while facing my window. i am a star gazer regularly so watching out of my window at night is a regular thing. i saw a very bright red light to the west, it took a few seconds to register it was not moving, it did not waiver at all! i stared at it trying to see what could be sitting there without this red light moving in any way. 15 seconds passed at least, then the light turned white and moved swiftly and directly south stopped, light turned red and turned directly north, stopped, it turned again south at high speed and disappeared out of my window view. i sat thinking what it could possibly be, thought of a drone, but realized it would have to be closer. this was higher than planes fly around here to and from the toronto airport. as i sat wondering, it had to be 20 sec or more, and it flew at the same speed it flew all along directly north  past and out of my window view. i texted my ex-husband who is a pilot and had mentioned to me about 5 years ago he saw something when he and another pilot were flying and was told to say nothing. i asked how fast a drone could fly as he has one, but i know it was no drone. as a very regular star gazer, there is always a first for everything!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Notice from bedroom window a bright red light, realized not moving turned white, with speed moved directly south, turned red, stopped, turned north, then  south out of sight, 15 sec later, passed window north direction, out of sight. did not return.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home on my way back from picking roommate from work. as i slowed car to intersection on dirt road i looked to my left (north) for clear traffic. there was no traffic but it the sky this massive bright blue sphere was just hovering there. after about 5 seconds which was about the time it took me to stop it started heading north north east below the clouds. it's cloudy to my north but no other direction.. lost sight, just vanished. as i turn south i see a low flying plane heading due north but the only airport for a plane of that size would be hays i believe and that s over an hour away so it wouldn't be that low yet. very loud plane bright white flashing lights on each wing.
content.summary: Bright blue white spherical object with decent size hovers then leaves

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:43 pm cst i observed fast white strobes (2-3 pulses per second) on the ne horizon. the lights were between 20-25 degrees elevation and appeared to be at least 3-5 miles away.  i initially questioned this being a plane due to the fast strobe so i watched it as it flew toward, over, and away from my position.  as the lights approached it was then i noted two round, unwavering, red lights facing downward.  i continued to observe and after the lights passed overhead it became more difficultt to observe the white strobes.
once the lights passed overhead and continued to move away at a fast rate of speed i observed no propellor, jet, or rotor noise whatsoever.  it was then i observed the red lights appear to dim, move slightly to the left, and then i saw the white strobes again.  this apparant 180 degree maneuver took less than 3 seconds and it was then the craft appeared to be coming at me again.  i observed the white strobes for 2-3 more seconds and the craft then turned back to its original course since i could no longer see the strobes.  it continued away from me for  another 2-3 and repeated this maneuver - coming at me then turning away again - before it disappeared over the horizon at approximately 25 degree elevation on the sw horizon.
i attempted to video the lights after it made the first course correction but the video is poor.  the lights can be seen approximately 3 seconds in at bottom center.  immediately after the video i observed what appeared to be a jet moving in from the nw on the last seen position of the craft.
noteworthy is that throughout this event i never heard and propulsion noises; the sky was relatively clear (stars clearly visible); i consumed no drugs/alcohol during the day.
i am an avid place guy so when i saw the tremendous speed and ability to turn on a dime coupled with the fast white strobe something seemed amiss.
i thought this might be some sort of drone but it would have to be military due to the range of travel from one horizon to another although i could not estimate height due to my inability to see anything other than lights.
content.summary: Observed fast moving lights change direction so within very small radius

content.detailedDescription: Saw a white light south west of my home it was cruising along the tree tops then it stopped it then shined a cone like white search light too the top of a tree for approx. 5 to 10 seconds the disappeared.
content.summary: Hovering over top of  a tree then shined a light beam to the top of tree

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work at 11:50pm on sunday night when i noticed on top the hill to my left that the woods was illuminated. it was a large area that i could see between the trees illuminating to the ground that i continued to look through my windshield while i was driving. that’s when lights over the trees began to appear. it was a large object that had lights in the shape of a triangle with a light in the center that was flying slow. it was distinctive that the lights were different colors. i immediately slowed down my vehicle very quickly and watched it fly away from hillside towards the road i was on. i looked in my rear view mirror to check for other vehicles so i don’t get rear ended and i saw headlights far behind me. i sped up and got off the first exit. the object crossed over me and was out of my line of sight as i approached the ramp. at the stop sign i put my vehicle in park, got outside, and stood on the exit ramp. i could not hear anything pertaining to the object and it was quiet outside. i saw it at a lower altitude flying northwest until it was out of sight. the only lights i saw on it was shining down towards the ground.  i got in my vehicle and finished driving home.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangled lighted aircraft flew over me

content.detailedDescription: Red orb in sky
content.summary: I was walking to store and looked up when i noticed several planes leaving chem-trails in the sky and started snapping photos. when i got home i looked at photos and noticed another light other than sun in phot

content.detailedDescription: Well on thnksgiving night around 12pm i went outside to smoke a cigarette i started glansing at the aky just to look at the stars but i saw a couple lights flashing so i thought it was stars but i took my phone out to try n see better and i saw crazy movements so i knew it couldnt b no airplane or jet or a helicopter and it was definitely no star.So i started taking pics and videos. it seems they (extraterrestrials) can send some kind of interference since my camer is clear but when teying to rwcord them or take a pic it gets blurry almost impossible for the phone to focus and get a good image of it.When i came up to the conclusion that it had to b ufos i got goosebumps even when teying to explain to my family i would stutter cause i couldnt believe what i just witnessed.Ao ever since that night i go outside to see the sky and im not gona lie or dont think im crazy but ive been seeing them every night till dis day but on nov 28 around 1am is the best evidence i have yet.I was recording the moon cause i had a strange feeling ao i did and by the way i was smoking a cigarette like i always do late at night. the moon was vreyish bluish like a waining crescent moon and as an 1hr or so passed by it started getting lower and it went from bluish greyiah to yellowish. and im trying to get the best focus on my camera phone and i can see sum objects to the side and infront.So im still recording.And im shaking its hard not to shake or tremble when witnessing this stuff. ita getting lower and more dark orange then i can see how it wasnt 1 big bright light but like a circle with lights over it and around it and it lookes in the video like it sbrinks and then out of nowhere it dissapears.Before it disappeared tho i could see a diamond shadow a little higher which is where thw object seemed to go when it vanished as if it camaflouged or idk.I just know ive been witnessing lots of ufo action and a couple other friends have as well after i told them to pay attention at the sky.Idk why they are here or whats going on but i thought it was gonna be cool seeing a ufo but really its scary not knowing why ive been seeing so many whats their purpose. i may sound crazy cause i know i probably wouldnt believw if somebody told me this but i swear on my sons life that is nothing bjt the absolute truth.The video in youtube ufos in dallas tx nov281am i didn't back it up in my phone n now os deletes i guess but i put sum other pics and videos that i got as well on the pics zoom in and all those things r dem believe it or not
content.summary: Big n bright like the moon size in the sky then started getting lower and the light got from one big white bluish to dark orange. u can see the big light become about 9 lights as it gets darker n disappears

content.detailedDescription: I was watching television when both of my dogs went to the bay window and very nervously started barking & whining. i stepped out on my porch facing the mountains to the east and witnessed a very bright light(helicopter?)& cigar shaped craft,halfway up the mountain,moving very slowly,from north to south,there was no sound. the craft and helicopter? moved approximately 3 to 4 miles,in a straight line,stopped, moved towards me(west)approximately 100 feet?,then turned back towards the north and slowly traveled approximately 2-3 miles before rising up above the mountain and disappearing behind it.The craft was illuminated the entire time by the bright light on the helicopter? the craft and helicopter? were approximately two to three miles away from me the entire time.I have lived here for seventeen years and have never seen a light on that mountain before, or witnessed my dogs so scared. i took a short video of the light & craft but the video is of bad quality.
content.summary: A bright light east of my house moving from north to south with a helicopter following behind and above. it illuminated the craft and trees.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were driving north on highway 41 in fond du lac wi.  my girlfriend was driving and i was seated in the front passenger seat.  the object was north east of us when we first saw it.  initially we thought it was an airplane.  the object was not far from the highway...Maybe a few hundred feet to the east and a few hundred feet in the air. it had two green lights and one red light.

once we got closer we realized it was not an airplane and we thought it was lights on some sort of stationary power pole or something.  we literally drive right by it and could clearly see that it was not connected to anything and was not a plane.  at the point we drive by it was directly east of us on my side of the vehicle.  as we passed the object was between my view and the moon.  i was able to see in clear view that it was a triangle with lights at each point.  i could also see through the object with the help of the moonlight.  it was essentially a hovering triangular seamless peice of glass with lights on it.

once we got north of the object i continued to watch it out the back window and could see that it started to move west at an increasing speed.  it was heading west until i lost sight of it as we continued driving north.

my girlfriend is/was a non believer in ufos. we both had no idea what to make of it.  she actually got a little upset.  being that i was not driving and was on the right side of the car i got a very good look at it for about 45 seconds.  it was shocking to me and am even a bit shocked while writing this. it was simply a sort of smaller compact aircraft that was essentially translucent, seamless, and triangular.
content.summary: Very low.  hovering object.  saw object as a passenger in a vehicle.  object passed between witness and moonlight.  could see that it was a clear/glasslike triangle. freaky.

content.detailedDescription: This second time the very next day and seeing 6 of then this time
content.summary: It happen on the november 28,2017 too but there was 6  this time

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were outside tonite , the sky was clear and a craft  appeared at high speed , very large in the night sky and fully lit up at high speed travelling in a zig zag formation and then just disapeared just a quickly into no-where, this caught our attention, then 1 minute  later a small light like a shooting star appeared for a second or two travelling in the opposite direction and again disappeared into nowhere . on a clear cloudless sky?

the way they travelled could not be on a normal earth orbit? very erratic.
content.summary: appeared at high speed for a few seconds and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was recording a plane shooting chemtrails going east in front of my house, then another plane appeared going west and at the end of the video a small black object fies across at a really high speed i can’t tell what it is . i didn’t see it until i was reviewing my video.
content.summary: Small black object shooting across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
5pm 12/2/17 rte. 2 north hero/alburg, vt  driving to dinner. crossing bridge to alburg saw 5 orange colored lights over the tree line in a backwards “l” shape.  directly over tree line in line of sight crossing the bridge.  not normal lights for that area, know it wasn’t a plane going to the local airport.
6:30 12/2/17 rte. 7 st albans, vt driving home from, we saw same or similar 5 orange lights over fields. we watched these 5 lights for a few miles heading north towards swanton. we turned onto comstock road and stopped by the railroad tracks. we got out of the car and watched these 5 lights change from an “l” shape to a back semi-circle to a line. we watched as the 5 passed over us.  one seemed to fall but not by gravity, but a calculated descent. the “4th in line, stopped, then “caught up” to the other 3. we watched the first three lights fly over us and climb and eventually disappear.  the 4th followed the same route.  there was no noise, as an airplane would emit. there were no blinking lights, the normal red/green. as we turned onto county road and saw a light like the ones in the sky, in the field in front of the tree line, we watched it “bounce” along the field.
content.summary: 5 lights in night sky - sighted twice in same evening

content.detailedDescription:
Wife (disbeliever in ufo phenom) and 2 minor sons witnessed and phoned me immediately. i believe the possibility but have never personally witnessed a ufo. 

travelling northbound on i35 between liberty and kearney missouri at dusk with plenty of blue sky and stars not yet visible witnessed extremely bright row of lights, belonging to one craft, hovering directly under the full moon to the east. after hovering a short time, circled south behind the car then flew straight up disappearing from view.
content.summary: Dusk no stars visible. extremely bright row lights. hovered under full moon. circled behind vehicle. disappeared straight up
